--- JetV / Pacifix / Ikoto / Soundwave ---

JetV initiates the cloaking device on the medium sized stealth 
cruiser, and begins to increase the speed of the ship. Hidden One 
begins to takes off of the planet in a relatively silent launch.

Soundwave watches the other DED members lose intrest in him, and he 
sneaks off to the pod that the Council wants him to bring aboard. 
<<This will be tricky...>> he thinks to himself, <<Here we go...>> He 
watches carefully, and then wheels the pot towards the ship's storage 
bay, when the others aren't looking. He then loads it on, and 
proceeds to cover it up. He hops out of the storage, and joins the 
group as silently as he had left. "DED, are we leaving? Radar shows 
that the Autobots are on the move." 

OOC: Hurry up Jer, DED must leave soon! =)



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix / JetV ---
> 
> Pacifix gets onboard the ship, and heads towards the control room.
> 
> JetV is there, and raring to go, "Pacifix, our engines are primed 
and 
> we are ready to go go go." JetV smiles in anticipation.
> 
> Pacifix nods his approval, and speaks the word, "Fly."
> 
> OOC: Tomorrow, when I'm not sleeping at the keyboard, I'll finish 
> this. =P
